Posts.Content: I agree, I only joined a few days ago and already have benefited from a wonderful load of advice, received plenty of cyber hugs and feel like for the first time I am not alone and going mad !!! My husband diagnosis has sent our world spiralling but I feel I cant complain, rant and generally ask for advice without judgment. I hope I will be able to pay it forward and give the same to others needing the support. X
Posts.Title: This is the best BC forum!
